comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Was Sultan of Morocco from 1908 to 1912. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abdelhafid_of_Morocco Here's an NY Times article where he seizes power: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9505E0DB153EE2...

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content:
NY Times, Aug 16, 1912, lead:

MARSEILLES, Aug. 15. -- Mulai Hafid, ex-Sultan of Morocco, arrived here this morning on board the steamship Macedonia. His progress to his hotel was watched by a dense throng of people, but there was no cheering.

and, another story (Aug 25, 1912)

PARIS, Aug. 24. -- Mulai Hafid, the ex-Sultan of Morocco, is the hero of the moment here. The atrocities which were committed in his name and which attracted the attention of the world appear to be entirely forgotten, and long tales of his doings and sayings at Vichy, where he is taking the cure, receive the place of honor in the daily press.
